bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Etiological Agent. Pathological Mechanism of a disorderly qi dynamic, with a failure to follow the regular sequence of upward and downward movement. Su wen 素問 39: 驚則心無所倚，神無所歸，慮 無所定，故氣亂矣 , “When one is frightened, the heart has nothing to lean on, the spirit has nowhere to return, and deliberations have nowhere to settle. Hence, the qi is in disorder ”.
